overview: A family of three (plus one rabbit) loses their social housing due to the father lying about being confined to a wheelchair and are subsequently forced to move into a cardboard box on top of Iceland's highest high rise.  Desperate to keep the family together and with a baby on the way, Steingrímur, the head of the family, comes up with a devious plan that could either save his family, or tear it apart completely.
title: When Rabbits Fly
